Text: Lottery WinnersBenjamin C Rogers You are a New York City Marathon Lottery winner Cheers YOU KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS DONT YOU You have earned the right to run brilliant miles through the streets of New York City on Sunday November Only days to go AND YOU KNOW WHAT THAT MEANS DONT YOU Its time to start training Start RIGHT NOW by outfitting yourself with the official Training for tshirt Why train in silence Let the world know your goal and wear a tshirt that keeps your training on track AND because today is your lucky day we have a great deal for you order your Training For tshirt before pm on Sunday Julyth and the shirt is yours for the special price of regularly or the Training for tee shirt and cap for Just note code in the shipping instructions and we will adjust your price To check it out please visit the NYC Marathon website at wwwnyrrcorgmerchandise Sincerely Your friends at the New York City Marathon Hey wait a minute pm What are you doing AWAKE Get in bed and get some rest Youre a Marathoner in Training Also now that your geared up why not register for an NYRRC race and get acclimatized to the racing experience Run with others consume water on the go not necessarily as easy as it looks and start dress rehearsing for the big day For information on our June favorites visit wwwnyrrcorg If you would like to be removed from this mailing list please reply to with the following subject line remove First Name Last Name ex remove John Doe
